briefdescription.para: Initialization parameters for the Generic Power Level Client model.

parameterdescription.para: Optional message handler structure.

briefdescription.para: Generic Power Level Client model composition data entry.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a Generic Power Level Client model instance.

briefdescription.para: Get the Power Level of the bound server.

detaileddescription.para: This call is blocking if the rsp buffer is non-NULL. Otherwise, this function will return, and the response will be passed to the bt_mesh_plvl_cli_handlers::power_status callback.

parameterdescription.para: Client model to send on.
Message context, or NULL to use the configured publish parameters.
Status response buffer, or NULL to keep from blocking.
Successfully sent the message and populated the rsp buffer.
A blocking request is already in progress.
A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.
The request timed out without a response.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_mesh_plvl_cli *cli, struct bt_mesh_msg_ctx *ctx, const struct bt_mesh_plvl_set *set, struct bt_mesh_plvl_status *rsp)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_plvl_cli_power_set

briefdescription.para: Set the Power Level of the server.

detaileddescription.para: This call is blocking if the rsp buffer is non-NULL. Otherwise, this function will return, and the response will be passed to the bt_mesh_plvl_cli_handlers::power_status callback.

parameterdescription.para: Client model to send on.
Message context, or NULL to use the configured publish parameters.
New Power Level value to set. Set set::transition to NULL to use the server's default transition parameters.
Response status buffer, or NULL to keep from blocking.
Successfully sent the message and populated the rsp buffer.
A blocking request is already in progress.
A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.
The request timed out without a response.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_mesh_plvl_cli *cli, struct bt_mesh_msg_ctx *ctx, const struct bt_mesh_plvl_set *set)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_plvl_cli_power_set_unack

briefdescription.para: Set the Power Level of the server without requesting a response.

parameterdescription.para: Client model to send on.
Message context, or NULL to use the configured publish parameters.
New Power Level value to set. Set set::transition to NULL to use the server's default transition parameters.
Successfully sent the message.
A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.

briefdescription.para: Get the last non-zero Power Level of the bound server.

detaileddescription.para: The last non-zero Power Level is the Power Level that will be restored if the Power Level changes from off to on and no Default Power is set.
This call is blocking if the rsp buffer is non-NULL. Otherwise, this function will return, and the response will be passed to the bt_mesh_plvl_cli_handlers::last_status callback.

parameterdescription.para: Client model to send on.
Message context, or NULL to use the configured publish parameters.
Status response buffer, or NULL to keep from blocking.
Successfully sent the message and populated the rsp buffer.
A blocking request is already in progress.
A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.
The request timed out without a response.
